CustomField.description: LEM-1343: When Salesforce generates a Contract for a Marketing Promotion, this field captures the DoorDash User who is responsible for countersigning the agreement once signed by the Mx.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Salesforce generates a Contract for a Marketing Promotion, this field captures the DoorDash User who is responsible for countersigning the agreement once signed by the Mx.
CustomField.label: DoorDash Signer
